text: The 1993 Tour de Hongrie was the 22nd edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 27 July to 1 August 1993. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Jens Dittmann. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1993 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" colspan="2" | Type ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 27 July | Budapest to Győr | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 28 July | Győr to Siófok | | alt= | Hilly stage | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 29 July | Siófok to Szekszárd | | alt= | Hilly stage | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text- align:right;" | 30 July | Szekszárd to Szolnok | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text-align:right;"; rowspan=2" | 31 July | Szolnok to Eger | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 6 | Felsőtárkány to Répáshuta | | link= | Individual time trial | |- ! scope="col" | 7 | style="text- align:right;" | 1 August | Miskolc to Budapest | | alt= | Hilly stage | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="4" style="text- align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text- align:center;" | 1 | | Thüringen | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Tipográfia-Bianchi | style="text- align:right;" | + 16" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Besançon | style="text-align:right;" | + 17" |} |} ==See also== * 1993 in sports ==References== 1993 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
